book.title: Designate, a DNSaaS component for OpenStack
book.para: Designate is a multi-tenant DNSaaS service for OpenStack. It provides a REST API with integrated Keystone authentication. It can be configured to auto-generate records based on Nova and Neutron actions. Designate supports a variety of DNS servers including Bind9 and PowerDNS.
For information on how to install Designate, see the Install Guide.
For information on the Designate API, see the API Reference.
